workshop.title: Data Lake Journey on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure OCI
workshop.description: In this workshop, you will explore the Oracle Big Data Cloud Platform on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure ( OCI ).

labs.description: Data Lake Journey on OCI: Overview

labs.title: Lab 300: More about BDC
labs.description: Working with Spark and SparkSQL on Zeppelin
